Sound Mix: Surround, Dolby SR, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Dolby Stereo
Synopsis: Maddox (Blake Shields) - bright but disenchanted, creative yet restless - views school as confining, even oppressive. He goes so far as to compare its environment to that of an asylum, with the students viewed as inmates. Maddox enlists a group of students to revolt against their educators in a solemn attempt to change school policy and curriculum. Maddox begins distributing propaganda throughout the school and captures the entire student body.
Title: New Port South
